questiones.question: Are you a veteran ?

options: I’m not, but my spouse is/was
fields.name: veteran
fields.label: Are you a veteran

questiones.sectionHint: This section is about your veteran status Information.
questiones.questionHint: Yes: If you have served in the military.No: If you have not served in the military.I’m not, but my spouse is/was: If you are not a veteran, but your spouse has served or is currently serving in the military.Please select the option that best applies      to you.

questiones.question: How long did you serve on active duty in the U.S. military, naval, or air service?

fields.name: veteran_experience
fields.label: How long did you serve on active duty in the U.S. military, naval, or air service

questiones.sectionHint: This section is about your veteran status Information.
questiones.questionHint: Less than 180 days: If your active duty service was for a period shorter than 180 days.More than 180 days: If your active duty service was for a period of 180 days or longer.Please select the option that best applies to your service duration.

questiones.question: Were you discharged or released under conditions other than dishonorable?

fields.name: veteran_release_condition
fields.label: Were you discharged or released under conditions other than dishonorable

questiones.sectionHint: This section is about your veteran status Information.
questiones.questionHint: Yes: If you were discharged or released under honorable, general, or other-than-dishonorable conditions.No: If you were discharged or released under dishonorable conditions.Please select 'Yes' or 'No' based on the type of discharge you received

questiones.question: Do you have a service-connected disability?

options: Yes, with a disability rating less than 30%
Yes, with a disability rating of 30% or more
fields.name: veteran_service_connected_disability
fields.label: Do you have a service-connected disability

questiones.sectionHint: This section is about your veteran status Information.
questiones.questionHint: No: If you do not have a disability related to your military service.Yes, with a disability rating less than 30%: If you have a service-connected disability with a rating below 30%.Yes, with a disability rating of 30% or more: If you have a service-connected disability with a rating of 30% or higher.Please select the option that best describes your situation.

questiones.question: Could you please select  your date of separation
questiones.sectionHint: This section is about your veteran status Information.
questiones.questionHint: Could you please select your date of birth? You can choose the date using the calendar option. Please make sure to enter it in the format MM/DD/YYYY. For example, if your birthday is January 5th, 1990, it should be entered as 01/05/1990.

questiones.sectionHint: This section is about your Personal Identifying Information.
questiones.questionHint: Does everything look good so far? Feel free to make any corrections. Otherwise, click 'Confirm' to proceed or 'Previous' to go back.
